word.kjv: He raiseth up the poor out of the dust, and lifteth up the beggar from the dunghill, to set them among princes, and to make them inherit the throne of glory: for the pillars of the earth are the LORD's, and he hath set the world upon them.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงยกคนยากจนขึ้นจากผงคลี พระองค์ทรงยกคนขอทานขึ้นจากกองขยะ กระทำให้เขานั่งร่วมกับเจ้านาย และได้ที่นั่งอันมีเกียรติเป็นมรดก เพราะว่าเสาแห่งพิภพเป็นของพระเยโฮวาห์ พระองค์ทรงวางพิภพไว้บนนั้น
word.spanish1909: El levanta del polvo al pobre, Y al menesteroso ensalza del estiércol, Para asentarlo con los príncipes; Y hace que tengan por heredad asiento de honra: Porque de Jehová son las columnas de la tierra, Y él asentó sobre ellas el mundo.
word.latinvulgate: Suscitat de pulvere egenum, et de stercore elevat pauperem : ut sedeat cum principibus, et solium gloriæ teneat. Domini enim sunt cardines terræ, et posuit super eos orbem.
word.italian1927: Rileva il misero dalla polvere e trae su il povero dal letame, per farli sedere coi principi, per farli eredi di un trono di gloria; poiché le colonne della terra son dell’Eterno, e sopra queste Egli ha posato il mondo.
word.german1912: Er hebt auf den Dürftigen aus dem Staub und erhöht den Armen aus dem Kot, daß er ihn setze unter die Fürsten und den Stuhl der Ehre erben lasse. Denn der Welt Grundfesten sind des HERRN, und er hat den Erdboden darauf gesetzt.
word.french1910: De la poussière il retire le pauvre, Du fumier il relève l'indigent, Pour les faire asseoir avec les grands. Et il leur donne en partage un trône de gloire; Car à l'Eternel sont les colonnes de la terre, Et c'est sur elles qu'il a posé le monde.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他從灰塵中抬舉貧寒的人，從糞堆中提拔窮乏的人，使他們與顯貴同坐，承受尊貴的座位。大地的柱子屬於耶和華，他把全地安放在柱子上面。
word.korean: 가난한 자를 진토에서 일으키시며 빈핍한 자를 거름더미에서 드사 귀족들과 함께 앉게 하시며 영광의 위를 차지하게 하시는도다 땅의 기둥들은 여호와의 것이라 여호와께서 세계를 그 위에 세우셨도다
word.tagalog: Kaniyang ibinabangon ang dukha mula sa alabok, Kaniyang itinataas ang mapagkailangan mula sa dumihan, Upang sila'y palukluking kasama ng mga prinsipe, At magmana ng luklukan ng kaluwalhatian: Sapagka't ang mga haligi ng lupa ay sa Panginoon, At kaniyang ipinatong ang sanglibutan sa kanila.
word.maori: Whakaarahia ana e ia te iti i roto i te puehu, ara ana i a ia te iti i roto i te puehu, ara ana i a ia te rawakore i roto i te puranga paru, a whakanohoia iho ki roto ki nga rangatira, meinga ana kia whiwhi ki te torona kororia: no Ihowa ra hoki nga pou turanga o te whenua; a whakanohoia iho e ia te ao ki runga.
word.cebuano: Siya magabangon sa kabus gikan sa abug, Iyang gituboy ang hangul gikan sa kalibangan, Aron sa pagpalingkod kanila uban sa mga principe, Ug manunod sa trono sa himaya: Kay ang mga haligi sa yuta iya ni Jehova, Ug iyang gitungtong ang kalibutan sa ibabaw nila.
word.hebrew: ח מקים מעפר דל מאשפת ירים אביון להושיב עם נדיבים וכסא כבוד ינחלם  כי ליהוה מצקי ארץ וישת עליהם תבל
word.hebrewmodern: מקים מעפר דל מאשפת ירים אביון להושיב עם נדיבים וכסא כבוד ינחלם כי ליהוה מצקי ארץ וישת עליהם תבל׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἀνιστᾷ ἀπὸ γῆς πένητα καὶ ἀπὸ κοπρίας ἐγείρει πτωχὸν καθίσαι μετὰ δυναστῶν λαῶν καὶ θρόνον δόξης κατακληρονομῶν αὐτοῖς

word.kjv: And the channels of the sea appeared, the foundations of the world were discovered, at the rebuking of the LORD, at the blast of the breath of his nostrils.
word.thailand: แล้วก็เห็นท้องธาร รากฐานของพิภพก็ปรากฏแจ้งตามการขนาบของพระเยโฮวาห์ ตามที่ลมพวยพุ่งจากช่องพระนาสิกของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Entonces aparecieron los manantiales de la mar, Y los fundamentos del mundo fueron descubiertos, A la reprensión de Jehová, Al resoplido del aliento de su nariz.
word.latinvulgate: Et apparuerunt effusiones maris, et revelata sunt fundamenta orbis ab increpatione Domini, ab inspiratione spiritus furoris ejus.
word.italian1927: Allora apparve il letto del mare, e i fondamenti del mondo furono scoperti allo sgridare dell’Eterno, al soffio del vento delle sue nari.
word.german1912: Da sah man das Bett der Wasser, und des Erdbodens Grund ward aufgedeckt von dem Schelten des HERRN, von dem Odem und Schnauben seiner Nase.
word.french1910: Le lit de la mer apparut, Les fondements du monde furent découverts, Par la menace de l'Eternel, Par le bruit du souffle de ses narines.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華的斥責一發，他鼻孔的氣一出，海底就出現，大地的根基也顯露。
word.korean: 이럴 때에 여호와의 꾸지람과 콧김을 인하여 물 밑이 드러나고 땅의 기초가 나타났도다
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y ang mga kalaliman sa dagat ay nangalitaw, Ang mga pinagtibayan ng sanglibutan ay nangakita. Dahil sa saway ng Panginoon, Sa hihip ng hinga ng kaniyang mga butas ng ilong.
word.maori: Na ka kitea nga takere o te moana, ka takoto kau nga putake o te ao i te whakatupehupehunga a Ihowa, i te whenunga o te manawa o ona pongaponga.
word.cebuano: Unya ang mga tinubdan sa dagat mingtungha, Ang mga patukoranan sa kalibutan nangadayag, Tungod sa pagbadlong ni Jehova, Sa paghuyop sa gininhawa sa iyang mga ilong.
word.hebrew: טז ויראו אפקי ים יגלו מסדות תבל  {ס}  בגערת יהוה מנשמת רוח אפו  {ר}
word.hebrewmodern: ויראו אפקי ים יגלו מסדות תבל בגערת יהוה מנשמת רוח אפו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ὤφθησαν ἀφέσεις θαλάσσης καὶ ἀπεκαλύφθη θεμέλια τῆς οἰκουμένης ἐν τῇ ἐπιτιμήσει κυρίου ἀπὸ πνοῆς πνεύματος θυμοῦ αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Fear before him, all the earth: the world also shall be stable, that it be not moved.
word.thailand: ชาวโลกทั้งสิ้นเอ๋ย จงตัวสั่นต่อเบื้องพระพักตร์พระองค์ เออ พิภพถูกสถาปนาแล้ว จะไม่หวั่นไหวเลย
word.spanish1909: Temed en su presencia, toda la tierra: El mundo será aún establecido, para que no se conmueva.
word.latinvulgate: Commoveatur a facie ejus omnis terra : ipse enim fundavit orbem immobilem.
word.italian1927: tremate dinanzi a lui, o abitanti di tutta la terra! Il mondo è stabile e non sarà smosso.
word.german1912: Es fürchte ihn alle Welt; er hat den Erdboden bereitet, daß er nicht bewegt wird.
word.french1910: Tremblez devant lui, vous tous habitants de la terre! Le monde est affermi, il ne chancelle point.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 全地要在他面前戰慄；他使世界堅定，不致搖動。
word.korean: 온 땅이여 그 앞에서 떨지어다 세계가 굳게 서고 흔들리지 못하는도다
word.tagalog: Manginig sa harap niya ang buong lupa: Ang sanglibutan nama'y natatatag na hindi makikilos.
word.maori: Kia wehi ra ki tona aroaro, e te whenua katoa: e u ano te ano, te taea te whakanekeneke.
word.cebuano: Pangurog sa atubangan niya, tibook nga yuta: Ang kalibutan usab natukod na nga dili mabalhin.
word.hebrew: ל חילו מלפניו כל הארץ--  {ר} אף תכון תבל בל תמוט  {ס}
word.hebrewmodern: חילו מלפניו כל הארץ אף תכון תבל בל תמוט׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: εὐφρανθήτω ὁ οὐρανός καὶ ἀγαλλιάσθω ἡ γῆ καὶ εἰπάτωσαν ἐν τοῖς ἔθνεσιν κύριος βασιλεύων

word.kjv: He shall be driven from light into darkness, and chased out of the world.
word.thailand: เขาจะถูกผลักไสจากความสว่างเข้าสู่ความมืด และจะถูกไล่ออกไปจากแผ่นดินโลก
word.spanish1909: De la luz será lanzado á las tinieblas, Y echado fuera del mundo.
word.latinvulgate: Expellet eum de luce in tenebras, et de orbe transferet eum.
word.italian1927: E’ cacciato dalla luce nelle tenebre, ed è bandito dal mondo.
word.german1912: Er wird vom Licht in die Finsternis vertrieben und vom Erdboden verstoßen werden.
word.french1910: Il est poussé de la lumière dans les ténèbres, Il est chassé du monde.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他們把他從光明中趕到黑暗裡，又把他從世界中趕出去。
word.korean: 그는 광명 중에서 흑암으로 몰려 들어가며 세상에서 쫓겨날 것이며
word.tagalog: Siya'y ihahatid sa kadiliman mula sa liwanag, at itatapon sa labas ng sanglibutan.
word.maori: Ka peia atu ano ia i roto i te marama ki te pouri, ka atiatia atu hoki i te ao.
word.cebuano: Siya papahawaon gikan sa kahayag ngadto sa kangitngitan, Ug siya igasalikway gikan sa kalibutan.
word.hebrew: יח  יהדפהו מאור אל-חשך    ומתבל ינדהו
word.hebrewmodern: יהדפהו מאור אל חשך ומתבל ינדהו׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἀπώσειεν αὐτὸν ἐκ φωτὸς εἰς σκότος

word.kjv: Who hath given him a charge over the earth? or who hath disposed the whole world?
word.thailand: ใครแต่งตั้งให้พระองค์ปกครองโลก หรือใครเล่ามอบหมายทั้งโลกไว้กับพระองค์
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién visitó por él la tierra? ¿Y quién puso en orden todo el mundo?
word.latinvulgate: Quem constituit alium super terram ? aut quem posuit super orbem quem fabricatus est ?
word.italian1927: Chi gli ha dato il governo della terra? Chi ha affidato l’universo alla sua cura?
word.german1912: Wer hat, was auf Erden ist, verordnet, und wer hat den ganzen Erdboden gesetzt?
word.french1910: Qui l'a chargé de gouverner la terre? Qui a confié l'univers à ses soins?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 誰派他管理大地？誰設立全世界呢？
word.korean: 누가 땅을 그에게 맡겼느냐 누가 온 세계를 정하였느냐
word.tagalog: Sinong nagbigay sa kaniya ng bilin sa lupa? O sinong nagayos ng buong sanglibutan?
word.maori: Na wai ia i mea hei kaitirotiro mo te whenua? Na wai hoki i whakatakoto nga tikanga mo te ao katoa?
word.cebuano: Kinsa ba ang naghatag kaniya ug gahum sa pagmando sa ibabaw sa yuta? Kun kinsa ba ang magbuot sa paghatag kaniya sa tibook nga kalibutan?
word.hebrew: יג  מי-פקד עליו ארצה    ומי שם תבל כלה
word.hebrewmodern: מי פקד עליו ארצה ומי שם תבל כלה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὃς ἐποίησεν τὴν γῆν τίς δέ ἐστιν ὁ ποιῶν τὴν ὑπ' οὐρανὸν καὶ τὰ ἐνόντα πάντα

word.kjv: And it is turned round about by his counsels: that they may do whatsoever he commandeth them upon the face of the world in the earth.
word.thailand: มันหันไปๆตามการนำของพระองค์ เพื่อให้มันทำตามที่พระองค์ทรงบัญชามันไว้เหนือผิวพิภพโลกนี้
word.spanish1909: Asimismo por sus designios se revuelven las nubes en derredor, Para hacer sobre la haz del mundo, En la tierra, lo que él les mandara.
word.latinvulgate: Quæ lustrant per circuitum, quocumque eas voluntas gubernantis duxerit, ad omne quod præceperit illis super faciem orbis terrarum :
word.italian1927: ed esse, da lui guidate, vanno vagando nei lor giri per eseguir quanto ei loro comanda sopra la faccia di tutta la terra;
word.german1912: Er kehrt die Wolken, wo er hin will, daß sie schaffen alles, was er ihnen gebeut, auf dem Erdboden: {~}
word.french1910: Leurs évolutions varient selon ses desseins, Pour l'accomplissement de tout ce qu'il leur ordonne, Sur la face de la terre habitée;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 電光照著　神的指引來往旋轉，在地球上行他一切所吩咐的。
word.korean: 네가 나던 날부터 아침을 명하였었느냐 ? 새벽으로 그 처소를 알게 하여
word.tagalog: At pumipihit sa palibot sa pamamagitan ng kaniyang patnubay, upang kanilang gawin ang anomang iutos niya sa kanila, sa ibabaw ng balat ng sanglibutang natatahanan:
word.maori: E whakakopikopikoa ana ano a tawhio noa, he mea hoki na ona whakaaro: hei mea i nga mea katoa e whakahaua atu ana e ia ki te mata o te ao:
word.cebuano: Ug sa iyang pagmando kana nagatuyok, Aron sila magatuman sumala sa bisan unsa nga iyang isugo kanila. Sa ibabaw sa kalibutan nga kapuy-an,
word.hebrew: יב  והוא מסבות מתהפך בתחבולתו    לפעלם כל אשר יצום    על-פני תבל ארצה
word.hebrewmodern: והוא מסבות מתהפך בתחבולתו לפעלם כל אשר יצום על פני תבל ארצה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ αὐτὸς κυκλώματα διαστρέψει ἐν θεεβουλαθω εἰς ἔργα αὐτῶν πάντα ὅσα ἂν ἐντείληται αὐτοῖς ταῦτα συντέτακται παρ' αὐτοῦ ἐπὶ τῆς γῆς

word.kjv: And he shall judge the world in righteousness, he shall minister judgment to the people in uprightness.
word.thailand: พระองค์จะทรงพิพากษาโลกด้วยความชอบธรรม พระองค์จะทรงพิพากษาบรรดาประชาชาติด้วยความเที่ยงธรรม
word.spanish1909: Y él juzgará el mundo con justicia; Y juzgará los pueblos con rectitud.
word.latinvulgate: et Dominus in æternum permanet. Paravit in judicio thronum suum ;
word.italian1927: Ed egli giudicherà il mondo con giustizia, giudicherà i popoli con rettitudine.
word.german1912: und er wird den Erdboden recht richten und die Völker regieren rechtschaffen.
word.french1910: Il juge le monde avec justice, Il juge les peuples avec droiture.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他必以公義審判世界，按正直判斷萬民。
word.korean: 공의로 세계를 심판하심이여 정직으로 만민에게 판단을 행하시리로다
word.tagalog: At hahatulan niya sa katuwiran ang sanglibutan, siya'y mangangasiwa ng karampatang kahatulan sa mga tao.
word.maori: A e whakarite ia mo te ao i runga i te tika, ka whakatakoto tikanga mo nga iwi i runga i te pono.
word.cebuano: Ug sa pagkamatarung magahukom siya sa kalibutan, Sa katul-id magapahamtang siya ug paghukom sa mga katawohan.
word.hebrew: ח  ויהוה לעולם ישב    כונן למשפט כסאו
word.hebrewmodern: והוא ישפט תבל בצדק ידין לאמים במישרים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ὁ κύριος εἰς τὸν αἰῶνα μένει ἡτοίμασεν ἐν κρίσει τὸν θρόνον αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: From men which are thy hand, O LORD, from men of the world, which have their portion in this life, and whose belly thou fillest with thy hid treasure: they are full of children, and leave the rest of their substance to their babes.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ ขอทรงช่วยข้าพระองค์ให้พ้นจากมนุษย์ผู้ซึ่งเป็นพระหัตถ์ของพระองค์ จากมนุษย์แห่งโลกนี้ จากมนุษย์ผู้ซึ่งมีส่วนของชีวิตนี้ ผู้ซึ่งพระองค์ทรงให้ท้องของเขาเต็มไปด้วยทรัพย์สมบัติที่พระองค์ทรงซ่อนไว้ พวกเขามีลูกหลานอุดมสมบูรณ์ และส่วนที่เหลือเขามอบไว้ให้แก่ลูกอ่อนของเขา
word.spanish1909: De los hombres con tu mano, oh Jehová, De los hombres de mundo, cuya parte es en esta vida, Y cuyo vientre hinches de tu tesoro: Hartan sus hijos, Y dejan el resto á sus chiquitos.
word.latinvulgate: Et intonuit de cælo Dominus, et Altissimus dedit vocem suam : grando et carbones ignis.
word.italian1927: liberami, con la tua mano, dagli uomini, o Eterno, dagli uomini del mondo la cui parte è in questa vita, e il cui ventre tu empi co’ tuoi tesori; hanno figliuoli in abbondanza, e lasciano il resto de’ loro averi ai loro fanciulli.
word.german1912: von den Leuten mit deiner Hand, HERR, von den Leuten dieser Welt, welche ihr Teil haben in ihrem Leben, welchen du den Bauch füllst mit deinem Schatz, die da Söhne die Fülle haben und lassen ihr übriges ihren Kindern.
word.french1910: Délivre-moi des hommes par ta main, Eternel, des hommes de ce monde! Leur part est dans la vie, Et tu remplis leur ventre de tes biens; Leurs enfants sont rassasiés, Et ils laissent leur superflu à leurs petits-enfants.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華啊！求你用手救我脫離世人，脫離那些只在今生有分的世人。求你用你為他們儲存的充滿他們的肚腹，使他們的兒女都可以飽嘗，他們還有剩餘的留給他們的子孫。
word.korean: 여호와여, 금생에서 저희 분깃을 받은 세상 사람에게서 나를 주의 손으로 구하소서 그는 주의 재물로 배를 채우심을 입고 자녀로 만족하고 그 남은 산업을 그 어린 아이들에게 유전하는 자니이다
word.tagalog: Sa mga tao, sa pamamagitan ng iyong kamay, Oh Panginoon, sa mga tao ng sanglibutan, na ang bahagi nila ay nasa buhay na ito, at ang tiyan nila'y pinupuno mo ng iyong kayamanan: kanilang binubusog ang kanilang mga anak, at iniiwan nila ang natira sa kanilang pag-aari sa kanilang sanggol.
word.maori: I nga tangata, ma tou ringa, e Ihowa, i nga tangata o te ao: kei tenei ora nei to ratou wahi, a e whakakiia ana o ratou kopu e koe ki tau taonga. E kiki ana ratou i te tamariki, whakarerea iho nga toenga o a ratou taonga ki a ratou kohungahunga.
word.cebuano: Gikan sa mga tawo, pinaagi sa imong kamot, Oh Jehova, Gikan sa mga tawo sa kalibutan, kansang bahin ania niining kinabuhia, Ug kansang tiyan gibusog mo sa imong bahandi: Sila nangabusog sa mga anak, Ug igabilin nila ang salin sa ilang bahandi ngadto sa ilang mga bata.
word.hebrew: יד  ממתים ידך יהוה    ממתים מחלד-- חלקם בחיים    וצפינך (וצפונך) תמלא בטנם ישבעו בנים--    והניחו יתרם לעולליהם
word.hebrewmodern: ממתים ידך יהוה ממתים מחלד חלקם בחיים וצפינך תמלא בטנם ישבעו בנים והניחו יתרם לעולליהם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐβρόντησεν ἐξ οὐρανοῦ κύριος καὶ ὁ ὕψιστος ἔδωκεν φωνὴν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Then the channels of waters were seen, and the foundations of the world were discovered at thy rebuke, O LORD, at the blast of the breath of thy nostrils.
word.thailand: ข้าแต่พระเยโฮวาห์ แล้วก็เห็นก้นทะเลตลอดจนรากฐานของพิภพก็ปรากฏแจ้ง เมื่อพระองค์ทรงขนาบทะเลด้วยลมที่พวกพุ่งจากช่องพระนาสิกของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Y aparecieron las honduras de las aguas, Y descubriéronse los cimientos del mundo, A tu reprensión, oh Jehová, Por el soplo del viento de tu nariz.
word.latinvulgate: Et erunt ut complaceant eloquia oris mei, et meditatio cordis mei in conspectu tuo semper. Domine, adjutor meus, et redemptor meus.
word.italian1927: Allora apparve il letto delle acque, e i fondamenti del mondo furono scoperti al tuo sgridare, o Eterno, al soffio del vento delle tue nari.
word.german1912: Da sah man das Bett der Wasser, und des Erdbodens Grund ward aufgedeckt, HERR, von deinem Schelten, von dem Odem und Schnauben deiner Nase.
word.french1910: Le lit des eaux apparut, Les fondements du monde furent découverts, Par ta menace, ô Eternel! Par le bruit du souffle de tes narines.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 耶和華斥責一發，你鼻孔的氣一出，海底就出現，大地的根基也顯露。
word.korean: 이럴 때에 여호와의 꾸지람과 콧김을 인하여 물밑이 드러나고 세상의 터가 나타났도다
word.tagalog: Nang magkagayo'y nagsilitaw ang mga lagusan ng tubig, at ang mga patibayan ng sanglibutan ay nangahubdan, sa iyong pagsaway, Oh Panginoon, sa hihip ng hinga ng iyong mga butas ng ilong.
word.maori: Katahi ka kitea nga takere o nga wai, a ka takoto kau nga putake o te ao i tau whakatupehupehutanga, e Ihowa, i te whengunga o te manawa o ou pongaponga.
word.cebuano: Unya mitungha ang mga kahiladman sa mga tubig, Ug ang mga patukoranan sa kalibutan naablihan, Sa imong pagbadlong, Oh Jehova, Tungod sa gininhawa sa imong ilong.
word.hebrew: טו  וישלח חציו ויפיצם    וברקים רב ויהמם
word.hebrewmodern: ויראו אפיקי מים ויגלו מוסדות תבל מגערתך יהוה מנשמת רוח אפך׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἔσονται εἰς εὐδοκίαν τὰ λόγια τοῦ στόματός μου καὶ ἡ μελέτη τῆς καρδίας μου ἐνώπιόν σου διὰ παντός κύριε βοηθέ μου καὶ λυτρωτά μου

word.kjv: Their line is gone out through all the earth, and their words to the end of the world. In them hath he set a tabernacle for the sun,
word.thailand: ถึงกระนั้นเสียงฟ้าก็ออกไปทั่วแผ่นดินโลก และถ้อยคำก็แพร่ไปถึงสุดปลายพิภพ พระองค์ทรงตั้งพลับพลาไว้ให้ดวงอาทิตย์ ณ ที่นั้น
word.spanish1909: Por toda la tierra salió su hilo, Y al cabo del mundo sus palabras. En ellos puso tabernáculo para el sol.
word.latinvulgate: Memor sit omnis sacrificii tui, et holocaustum tuum pingue fiat.
word.italian1927: Ma il loro suono esce fuori per tutta la terra, e i loro accenti vanno fino all’estremità del mondo. Quivi Iddio ha posto una tenda per il sole,
word.german1912: Ihre Schnur geht aus in alle Lande und ihre Rede an der Welt Ende. Er hat der Sonne eine Hütte an ihnen gemacht;
word.french1910: Leur retentissement parcourt toute la terre, Leurs accents vont aux extrémités du monde, Où il a dressé une tente pour le soleil.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 它們的聲音（“聲音”原文作“準繩”）傳遍全地，它們的言語傳到地極，　神在它們中間為太陽安設帳幕。
word.korean: 그 소리가 온 땅에 통하고 그 말씀이 세계 끝까지 이르도다 하나님이 해를 위하여 하늘에 장막을 베푸셨도다
word.tagalog: Ang kanilang pangungusap ay lumaganap sa buong lupa, at ang kanilang mga salita ay hanggang sa wakas ng sanglibutan. Sa kanila inilagay niya ang tabernakulo na ukol sa araw,
word.maori: Kua puta ta ratou aho ki te whenua katoa, a ratou kupu, a te pito ra ano o te ao. Whakaturia ana e ia ki reira te tapenakara mo te ra;
word.cebuano: Sa tibook nga yuta migula ang ilang latid, Ug sa kinatumyan sa kalibutan ang ilang mga pulong. Diha kanila gibutang niya ang usa ka balong-balong sa adlaw,
word.hebrew: ד  אין-אמר ואין דברים    בלי נשמע קולם
word.hebrewmodern: בכל הארץ יצא קום ובקצה תבל מליהם לשמש שם אהל בהם׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: μνησθείη πάσης θυσίας σου καὶ τὸ ὁλοκαύτωμά σου πιανάτω διάψαλμα

word.kjv: All the ends of the world shall remember and turn unto the LORD: and all the kindreds of the nations shall worship before thee.
word.thailand: ที่สุดปลายทั้งสิ้นของแผ่นดินโลกจะจดจำและหันกลับมายังพระเยโฮวาห์ และครอบครัวทั้งสิ้นของบรรดาประชาชาติจะนมัสการต่อพระพักตร์พระองค์
word.spanish1909: Acordarse han, y volveránse á Jehová todos los términos de la tierra; Y se humillarán delante de ti todas las familias de las gentes.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Tutte le estremità della terra si ricorderan dell’Eterno e si convertiranno a lui; e tutte le famiglie delle nazioni adoreranno nel tuo cospetto.
word.german1912: Es werden gedenken und sich zum HERRN bekehren aller Welt Enden und vor ihm anbeten alle Geschlechter der Heiden.
word.french1910: Toutes les extrémités de la terre penseront à l'Eternel et se tourneront vers lui; Toutes les familles des nations se prosterneront devant ta face.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 地的四極，都要記念耶和華，並且歸向他。列國的萬族，都要在他（“他”有古抄本作“你”）面前敬拜。
word.korean: 땅의 모든 끝이 여호와를 기억하고 돌아오며 열방의 모든 족속이 주의 앞에 경배하리니
word.tagalog: Lahat ng mga wakas ng lupa ay makakaalaala, at magsisipanumbalik sa Panginoon: at lahat ng mga angkan ng mga bansa ay magsisisamba sa harap mo.
word.maori: E mahara nga pito katoa o te whenua, a ka tahuri ki a Ihowa: ka koropiko ano nga hapu katoa o nga iwi ki tou aroaro.
word.cebuano: Ang tanang mga kinatumyan sa yuta mahinumdum ug managbalik ngadto kang Jehova; Ug ang tanang mga kabanayan sa mga kanasuran managsimba sa atubangan mo.
word.hebrew: כז  יאכלו ענוים וישבעו--    יהללו יהוה דרשיו יחי לבבכם    לעד
word.hebrewmodern: יזכרו וישבו אל יהוה כל אפסי ארץ וישתחוו לפניך כל משפחות גוים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version

word.kjv: The earth is the LORD's, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.
word.thailand: แผ่นดินโลกกับสรรพสิ่งในโลกนั้นเป็นของพระเยโฮวาห์ ทั้งพิภพกับบรรดาผู้ที่อยู่ในพิภพนั้น
word.spanish1909: Salmo de David. DE Jehová es la tierra y su plenitud; El mundo, y los que en él habitan.
word.latinvulgate: In finem. Psalmus David. Ad te, Domine, levai animam meam.
word.italian1927: Salmo di Davide. All’Eterno appartiene la terra e tutto ciò ch’è in essa, il mondo e i suoi abitanti.
word.german1912: Ein Psalm Davids. Die Erde ist des HERRN und was darinnen ist, der Erdboden und was darauf wohnt.
word.french1910: Psaume de David. A l'Eternel la terre et ce qu'elle renferme, Le monde et ceux qui l'habitent!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大衛的詩。地和地上所充滿的，世界和住在世上的，都是屬於耶和華的。（本節在《馬索拉抄本》包括細字標題）
word.korean: (다윗의 시) 땅과 거기 충만한 것과 세계와 그 중에 거하는 자가 다 여호와의 것이로다
word.tagalog: Ang lupa ay sa Panginoon at ang buong narito; ang sanglibutan, at silang nagsisitahan dito.
word.maori: ¶ He himene na Rawiri. No Ihowa te whenua, me ona tini mea, te ao, me nga tangata e noho ana i runga.
word.cebuano: Iya ni Jehova ang yuta ug ang pagkapuno niana; Ang kalibutan, ug sila nga mga nanagpuyo niini;
word.hebrew: א  לדוד מזמור ליהוה הארץ ומלואה    תבל וישבי בה
word.hebrewmodern: לדוד מזמור ליהוה הארץ ומלואה תבל וישבי בה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ πρὸς σέ κύριε ἦρα τὴν ψυχήν μου ὁ θεός μου

word.kjv: Let all the earth fear the LORD: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
word.thailand: ให้แผ่นดินโลกทั้งสิ้นยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์ ให้บรรดาชาวพิภพทั้งปวงยืนตะลึงพรึงเพริดต่อพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Tema á Jehová toda la tierra: Teman de él todos los habitadores del mundo.
word.latinvulgate: Immittet angelus Domini in circuitu timentium eum, et eripiet eos.
word.italian1927: Tutta la terra tema l’Eterno; lo paventino tutti gli abitanti del mondo.
word.german1912: Alle Welt fürchte den Herrn; und vor ihm scheue sich alles, was auf dem Erdboden wohnt.
word.french1910: Que toute la terre craigne l'Eternel! Que tous les habitants du monde tremblent devant lui!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願全地都敬畏耶和華，願世上的居民都懼怕他。
word.korean: 온 땅은 여호와를 두려워 하며 세계의 모든 거민은 그를 경외할지어다
word.tagalog: Matakot nawa ang buong lupa sa Panginoon: magsitayo nawang may takot ang lahat ng taga sanglibutan sa kaniya.
word.maori: Kia wehi te whenua katoa ki a Ihowa; kia ohooho nga tangata katoa o te ao ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Pahadloka kang Jehova ang tibook nga yuta: Patindoga nga may kataha kaniya ang tanang mga pumoluyo sa kalibutan.
word.hebrew: ח  ייראו מיהוה כל-הארץ    ממנו יגורו כל-ישבי תבל
word.hebrewmodern: ייראו מיהוה כל הארץ ממנו יגורו כל ישבי תבל׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: παρεμβαλεῖ ἄγγελος κυρίου κύκλῳ τῶν φοβουμένων αὐτὸν καὶ ῥύσεται αὐτούς

word.kjv: Hear this, all ye people; give ear, all ye inhabitants of the world:
word.thailand: ดูก่อนชาติทั้งหลาย จงฟังข้อความนี้ ชาวพิภพทั้งปวงเอ๋ย จงเงี่ยหูฟัง
word.spanish1909: Al Músico principal: Salmo para los hijos de Coré. OID esto, pueblos todos; Escuchad, habitadores todos del mundo:
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus Asaph. Deus deorum, Dominus, locutus est, et vocavit terram a solis ortu usque ad occasum.
word.italian1927: Per il Capo de’ musici. De’ figliuoli di Core. Salmo. Udite questo, popoli tutti; porgete orecchio, voi tutti gli abitanti del mondo!
word.german1912: Ein Psalm der Kinder Korah, vorzusingen.  Höret zu, alle Völker; merket auf, alle, die in dieser Zeit leben,
word.french1910: Au chef des chantres. Des fils de Koré. Psaume. Ecoutez ceci, vous tous, peuples, Prêtez l'oreille, vous tous, habitants du monde,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 可拉子孫的詩，交給詩班長。萬民哪！你們要聽這話；世上的居民哪！你們要留心聽。
word.korean: (고라 자손의 시. 영장으로 한 노래) 만민들아 이를 들어라 세상의 거민들아 귀를 기울이라
word.tagalog: Dinggin ninyo ito, ninyong lahat na mga bayan; pakinggan ninyo, ninyong lahat na nananahan sa daigdig:
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tino kaiwhakatangi. He himene ma nga tama a Koraha. Whakarongo ki tenei, e nga iwi katoa: tahuri mai o koutou taringa, e nga tangata katoa o te ao.
word.cebuano: Patalinghugi ninyo kini, mga katawohan nga tanan; Pamati kamo, mga pumoluyo ngatanan sa kalibutan;
word.hebrewmodern: למנצח לבני קרח מזמור שמעו זאת כל העמים האזינו כל ישבי חלד׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ψαλμὸς τῷ ασαφ θεὸς θεῶν κύριος ἐλάλησεν καὶ ἐκάλεσεν τὴν γῆν ἀπὸ ἀνατολῶν ἡλίου καὶ μέχρι δυσμῶν

word.kjv: If I were hungry, I would not tell thee: for the world is mine, and the fulness thereof.
word.thailand: ถ้าเราหิว เราจะไม่บอกเจ้า เพราะพิภพและสารพัดที่อยู่ในนั้นเป็นของเรา
word.spanish1909: Si yo tuviese hambre, no te lo diría á ti: Porque mío es el mundo y su plenitud.
word.latinvulgate: Cor mundum crea in me, Deus, et spiritum rectum innova in visceribus meis.
word.italian1927: Se avessi fame, non te lo direi, perché il mondo, con tutto quel che contiene, è mio.
word.german1912: Wo mich hungerte, wollte ich dir nicht davon sagen; denn der Erdboden ist mein und alles, was darinnen ist.
word.french1910: Si j'avais faim, je ne te le dirais pas, Car le monde est à moi et tout ce qu'il renferme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果我餓了，我也不用對你說；因為世界和其中所充滿的，都是我的。
word.korean: 내가 가령 주려도 네게 이르지 않을 것은 세계와 거기 충만한 것이 내 것임이로다
word.tagalog: Kung ako'y magutom ay hindi ko sasaysayin sa iyo: sapagka't ang sanglibutan ay akin, at ang buong narito.
word.maori: Me he matekai toku, e kore ahau e korero ki a koe: naku nei hoki te ao, me ona tini mea.
word.cebuano: Kong ako pagagutumon, ako dili mosulti kanimo; Kay ang kalibutan ako man, ug ang kahupnganan niini.
word.hebrew: יב  אם-ארעב לא-אמר לך    כי-לי תבל ומלאה
word.hebrewmodern: אם ארעב לא אמר לך כי לי תבל ומלאה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καρδίαν καθαρὰν κτίσον ἐν ἐμοί ὁ θεός καὶ πνεῦμα εὐθὲς ἐγκαίνισον ἐν τοῖς ἐγκάτοις μου

word.kjv: Behold, these are the ungodly, who prosper in the world; they increase in riches.
word.thailand: ดูเถิด คนอธรรมเป็นเช่นนี้แหละ เขาเจริญในแผ่นดินโลกและร่ำรวยขึ้น
word.spanish1909: He aquí estos impíos, Sin ser turbados del mundo, alcanzaron riquezas.
word.latinvulgate: Deus autem rex noster ante sæcula, operatus est salutem in medio terræ.
word.italian1927: Ecco, costoro sono empi: eppure, tranquilli sempre, essi accrescono i loro averi.
word.german1912: Siehe, das sind die Gottlosen; die sind glücklich in der Welt und werden reich.
word.french1910: Ainsi sont les méchants: Toujours heureux, ils accroissent leurs richesses.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 看這些惡人，他們常享安逸，財富卻增加。
word.korean: 볼지어다 ! 이들은 악인이라 항상 평안하고 재물은 더 하도다
word.tagalog: Narito, ang mga ito ang masama; at palibhasa'y laging tiwasay nagsisilago sa mga kayamanan,
word.maori: Nana, ko te hunga kino tenei, kei runga tonu i te whenua rangatira, e hua ana o ratou taonga.
word.cebuano: Ania karon, kini mao ang mga dautan; Ug, sanglit anaa kanunay sa kasayon, sila ming-uswag sa mga bahandi.
word.hebrew: יב  הנה-אלה רשעים    ושלוי עולם השגו-חיל
word.hebrewmodern: הנה אלה רשעים ושלוי עולם השגו חיל׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὁ δὲ θεὸς βασιλεὺς ἡμῶν πρὸ αἰῶνος εἰργάσατο σωτηρίαν ἐν μέσῳ τῆς γῆς

word.kjv: The voice of thy thunder was in the heaven: the lightnings lightened the world: the earth trembled and shook.
word.thailand: ฟ้าผ่าของพระองค์มีเสียงอยู่ในฟ้าสวรรค์ ฟ้าแลบทำให้พิภพสว่าง แผ่นดินโลกก็สั่นสะเทือนและหวั่นไหว
word.spanish1909: Anduvo en derredor el sonido de tus truenos; Los relámpagos alumbraron el mundo; Estremecióse y tembló la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Et tentaverunt Deum in cordibus suis, ut peterent escas animabus suis.
word.italian1927: La voce del tuo tuono era nel turbine; i lampi illuminarono il mondo; la terra fu scossa e tremò.
word.german1912: Es donnerte im Himmel, deine Blitze leuchteten auf dem Erdboden; das Erdreich regte sich und bebte davon.
word.french1910: Ton tonnerre éclata dans le tourbillon, Les éclairs illuminèrent le monde; La terre s'émut et trembla.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你的雷聲在旋風中響起來，閃電照亮了世界，大地戰抖震動。
word.korean: 회리바람 중에 주의 우뢰의 소리가 있으며 번개가 세계를 비취며 땅이 흔들리고 움직였나이다
word.tagalog: Ang tinig ng iyong kulog, ay nasa ipoipo; tinanglawan ng mga kidlat ang sanglibutan: ang lupa ay nayanig at umuga.
word.maori: I roto i te awhiowhio te haruru o tau whatitiri: marama noa te ao i nga uira; wiri ana te whenua, oioi ana.
word.cebuano: Diha sa mga alimpulos ang tingog sa imong dalugdog; Ang mga kilat minghayag sa kalibutan: Ang yuta mikurog ug miuyog.
word.hebrew: יח  זרמו מים עבות--קול נתנו שחקים    אף-חצציך יתהלכו
word.hebrewmodern: קול רעמך בגלגל האירו ברקים תבל רגזה ותרעש הארץ׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: καὶ ἐξεπείρασαν τὸν θεὸν ἐν ταῖς καρδίαις αὐτῶν τοῦ αἰτῆσαι βρώματα ταῖς ψυχαῖς αὐτῶν

word.kjv: The heavens are thine, the earth also is thine: as for the world and the fulness thereof, thou hast founded them.
word.thailand: ฟ้าสวรรค์เป็นของพระองค์ แผ่นดินโลกเป็นของพระองค์ด้วย พระองค์ได้ทรงตั้งพิภพและบรรดาสิ่งที่อยู่ในนั้น
word.spanish1909: Tuyos los cielos, tuya también la tierra: El mundo y su plenitud, tú lo fundaste.
word.latinvulgate: Quis novit potestatem iræ tuæ,
word.italian1927: I cieli son tuoi, tua pure è la terra; tu hai fondato il mondo e tutto ciò ch’è in esso.
word.german1912: Himmel und Erde ist dein; du hast gegründet den Erdboden und was darinnen ist.
word.french1910: C'est à toi qu'appartiennent les cieux et la terre, C'est toi qui as fondé le monde et ce qu'il renferme.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 天是你的，地也是你的；世界和世界充滿的，都是你建立的。
word.korean: 하늘이 주의 것이요 땅도 주의 것이라 세계와 그 중에 충만한 것을 주께서 건설하셨나이다
word.tagalog: Ang langit ay iyo, ang lupa ay iyo rin: ang sanglibutan at ang buong narito ay iyong itinatag,
word.maori: Nau nga rangi, nau te whenua: te ao me ona mea e hua ana i runga, nau ena i pumau ai.
word.cebuano: Ang mga kalangitan imo man, ang yuta usab imo man: Ang kalibutan ug ang kahupnganan niana, imong gitukod sila.
word.hebrew: יא  אתה דכאת כחלל רהב    בזרוע עזך פזרת אויביך
word.hebrewmodern: לך שמים אף לך ארץ תבל ומלאה אתה יסדתם׃

word.greekot: τίς γινώσκει τὸ κράτος τῆς ὀργῆς σου καὶ ἀπὸ τοῦ φόβου σου τὸν θυμόν σου

word.kjv: Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever thou hadst formed the earth and the world, even from everlasting to everlasting, thou art God.
word.thailand: ก่อนที่ภูเขาทั้งหลายเกิดขึ้นมา ก่อนที่พระองค์ทรงให้กำเนิดแผ่นดินโลกและพิภพ พระองค์ทรงเป็นพระเจ้าตั้งแต่นิรันดร์กาลถึงนิรันดร์กาล
word.spanish1909: Antes que naciesen los montes Y formases la tierra y el mundo, Y desde el siglo y hasta el siglo, tú eres Dios.
word.latinvulgate: Dicet Domino : Susceptor meus es tu et refugium meum ; Deus meus, sperabo in eum.
word.italian1927: Avanti che i monti fossero nati e che tu avessi formato la terra e il mondo, anzi, ab eterno in eterno, tu sei Dio.
word.german1912: Ehe denn die Berge wurden und die Erde und die Welt geschaffen wurden, bist du, Gott, von Ewigkeit zu Ewigkeit,
word.french1910: Avant que les montagnes fussent nées, Et que tu eusses créé la terre et le monde, D'éternité en éternité tu es Dieu.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 群山尚未生出，大地和世界你未曾造成，從永遠到永遠，你是　神。
word.korean: 산이 생기기 전, 땅과 세계도 주께서 조성하시기 전 곧 영원부터 영원까지 주는 하나님이시니이다
word.tagalog: Bago nalabas ang mga bundok, O bago mo nilikha ang lupa at ang sanglibutan, mula nga ng walang pasimula hanggang sa walang hanggan, ikaw ang Dios.
word.maori: Kahore ano i whanau noa nga maunga, kahore i hanga e koe te whenua me te ao, ko koe te Atua no tua whakarere a ake tonu atu.
word.cebuano: Sa wala pa patunghaa ang kabukiran, Kun ang yuta ug ang kalibutan nga imong gihimo, Bisan gikan sa walay sinugdan ngadto sa walay katapusan, ikaw mao ang Dios sa gihapon .
word.hebrew: ב  בטרם הרים ילדו--    ותחולל ארץ ותבל ומעולם עד-עולם    אתה אל
word.hebrewmodern: בטרם הרים ילדו ותחולל ארץ ותבל ומעולם עד עולם אתה אל׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ἐρεῖ τῷ κυρίῳ ἀντιλήμπτωρ μου εἶ καὶ καταφυγή μου ὁ θεός μου ἐλπιῶ ἐπ' αὐτόν

word.kjv: The LORD reigneth, he is clothed with majesty; the LORD is clothed with strength, wherewith he hath girded himself: the world also is stablished, that it cannot be moved.
word.thailand: พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงครอบครอง พระองค์ทรงสวมความยิ่งใหญ่ พระเยโฮวาห์ทรงสวมกำลัง พระองค์ทรงเอาพระกำลังคาดพระองค์ โลกได้สถาปนาไว้แล้ว มันจะไม่หวั่นไหว
word.spanish1909: JEHOVA reina, vistióse de magnificencia, Vistióse Jehová, ciñose de fortaleza; Afirmó también el mundo, que no se moverá.
word.latinvulgate: Psalmus ipsi David, quarta sabbati. Deus ultionum Dominus ; Deus ultionum libere egit.
word.italian1927: L’Eterno regna; egli s’è rivestito di maestà; l’Eterno s’è rivestito, s’è cinto di forza; il mondo quindi è stabile, e non sarà smosso.
word.german1912: Der HERR ist König und herrlich geschmückt; der HERR ist geschmückt und hat ein Reich angefangen, soweit die Welt ist, und zugerichtet, daß es bleiben soll.
word.french1910: L'Eternel règne, il est revêtu de majesté, L'Eternel est revêtu, il est ceint de force. Aussi le monde est ferme, il ne chancelle pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 稱頌　神的威嚴和大能耶和華作王，他以威嚴為衣；耶和華以威嚴為衣，以能力束腰，世界就得以堅立，永不動搖。
word.korean: 여호와께서 통치하시니 스스로 권위를 입으셨도다 여호와께서 능력을 입으시며 띠셨으므로 세계도 견고히 서서 요동치 아니하도다
word.tagalog: Ang Panginoon ay naghahari; siya'y nananamit ng karilagan; ang Panginoon ay nananamit ng kalakasan; siya'y nagbigkis niyaon: ang sanglibutan naman ay natatag, na hindi mababago.
word.maori: ¶ E kingi ana a Ihowa; he kororia tona kakahu; he kakahu to Ihowa, he mea whitiki ia ki te kaha: kua u hoki te ao, te taea te nekeneke.
word.cebuano: Si Jehova nagahari; nagabisti siya sa pagkahalangdon; Nagabisti si Jehova sa pagkaligon; gibaksan niya ang iyang kaugalingon niini: Gilig-on niya usab ang kalibutan, nga kini dili matarug.
word.hebrew: א  יהוה מלך    גאות לבש לבש יהוה עז התאזר    אף-תכון תבל בל-תמוט
word.hebrewmodern: יהוה מלך גאות לבש לבש יהוה עז התאזר אף תכון תבל בל תמוט׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ψαλμὸς τῷ δαυιδ τετράδι σαββάτων ὁ θεὸς ἐκδικήσεων κύριος ὁ θεὸς ἐκδικήσεων ἐπαρρησιάσατο

word.kjv: Say among the heathen that the LORD reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.
word.thailand: จงพูดท่ามกลางบรรดาประชาชาติว่าพระเยโฮวาห์ทรงครอบครอง เออ พิภพจะถูกสถาปนาเพื่อมันจะไม่หวั่นไหวเลย พระองค์จะทรงพิพากษาชนชาติทั้งหลายด้วยความชอบธรรม
word.spanish1909: Decid en las gentes: Jehová reinó, También afirmó el mundo, no será conmovido: Juzgará á los pueblos en justicia.
word.latinvulgate: Qui diligitis Dominum, odite malum ; custodit Dominus animas sanctorum suorum, de manu peccatoris liberabit eos.
word.italian1927: Dite fra le nazioni: l’Eterno regna; il mondo quindi è stabile e non sarà smosso; l’Eterno giudicherà i popoli con rettitudine.
word.german1912: Saget unter den Heiden, daß der HERR König sei und habe sein Reich, soweit die Welt ist, bereitet, daß es bleiben soll, und richtet die Völker recht.
word.french1910: Dites parmi les nations: L'Eternel règne; Aussi le monde est ferme, il ne chancelle pas; L'Eternel juge les peuples avec droiture.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要在萬國中宣告：“耶和華作王！”世界就堅定，必不動搖；他必按著公正審判萬民。
word.korean: 열방 중에서는 이르기를 여호와께서 통치하시니 세계가 굳게 서고 흔들리지 못할지라 저가 만민을 공평히 판단하시리라 할지로다
word.tagalog: Sabihin ninyo sa gitna ng mga bansa, ang Panginoon ay naghahari: ang sanglibutan naman ay natatatag na hindi makikilos: kaniyang hahatulan ng karapatan ang mga bayan.
word.maori: ¶ Mea atu i waenganui o nga tauiwi, E kingi ana a Ihowa: ka u te whenua, te taea te whakangaueue; ka tika ana whakawa mo nga iwi.
word.cebuano: Isugilon sa taliwala sa mga nasud: si Jehova nagahari: Ang kalibutan usab natukod nga kini dili matarug: Pagahukman niya ang mga katawohan sa katul-id.
word.hebrew: י  אמרו בגוים יהוה מלך--    אף-תכון תבל בל-תמוט ידין עמים    במישרים
word.hebrewmodern: אמרו בגוים יהוה מלך אף תכון תבל בל תמוט ידין עמים במישרים׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: οἱ ἀγαπῶντες τὸν κύριον μισεῖτε πονηρόν φυλάσσει κύριος τὰς ψυχὰς τῶν ὁσίων αὐτοῦ ἐκ χειρὸς ἁμαρτωλῶν ῥύσεται αὐτούς

word.kjv: Before the LORD: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
word.thailand: เฉพาะพระพักตร์พระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระองค์เสด็จมา ด้วยพระองค์เสด็จมาพิพากษาโลก พระองค์จะทรงพิพากษาโลกด้วยความชอบธรรม และชนชาติทั้งหลายด้วยความจริงของพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Delante de Jehová que vino: Porque vino á juzgar la tierra. Juzgará al mundo con justicia, Y á los pueblos con su verdad.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: nel cospetto dell’Eterno; poich’egli viene, viene a giudicare la terra. Egli giudicherà il mondo con giustizia, e i popoli secondo la sua fedeltà.
word.german1912: vor dem HERRN; denn er kommt, denn er kommt, zu richten das Erdreich. Er wird den Erdboden richten mit Gerechtigkeit und die Völker mit seiner Wahrheit.
word.french1910: Devant l'Eternel! Car il vient, Car il vient pour juger la terre; Il jugera le monde avec justice, Et les peuples selon sa fidélité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 它們都要在耶和華面前歡呼，因為他來了；他來要審判全地。他要按著公義審判世界，憑著他的信實審判萬民。
word.korean: 저가 임하시되 땅을 판단하려 임하실 것임이라 저가 의로 세계를 판단하시며 그의 진실하심으로 백성을 판단하시리로다
word.tagalog: Sa harap ng Panginoon; sapagka't siya'y dumarating: sapagka't siya'y dumarating upang hatulan ang lupa: kaniyang hahatulan ng katuwiran ang sanglibutan, at ng kaniyang katotohanan ang mga bayan.
word.maori: Ki te aroaro o Ihowa, e haere mai ana hoki ia; e haere mai ana ia ki te whakawa mo te whenua: ka whakawa ia mo te ao i runga i te tika, mo nga iwi hoki i runga i tona pono.
word.cebuano: Sa atubangan ni Jehova; kay moabut na siya, Kay siya moanhi sa paghukom sa yuta: Pagahukman niya ang kalibutan uban ang pagkamatarung, Ug ang katawohan uban ang iyang kamatuoran.
word.hebrew: יג  לפני יהוה כי בא--    כי בא לשפט הארץ ישפט-תבל בצדק    ועמים באמונתו
word.hebrewmodern: לפני יהוה כי בא כי בא לשפט הארץ ישפט תבל בצדק ועמים באמונתו׃

word.kjv: His lightnings enlightened the world: the earth saw, and trembled.

word.spanish1909: Sus relámpagos alumbraron el mundo: La tierra vió, y estremecióse.
word.latinvulgate: Jubilate Deo, omnis terra ; cantate et exsultate, et psallite.
word.italian1927: I suoi lampi illuminano il mondo; la terra lo vede e trema.
word.german1912: Seine Blitze leuchten auf den Erdboden; das Erdreich siehet's und erschrickt.
word.french1910: Ses éclairs illuminent le monde, La terre le voit et tremble;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他的閃電照亮世界，大地看見了就戰慄。
word.korean: 그의 번개가 세계를 비추니 땅이 보고 떨었도다
word.tagalog: Tumatanglaw ang mga kidlat niya sa sanglibutan: nakita ng lupa, at niyanig.
word.maori: Marama tonu te ao i ana uira: i kite te whenua, a wiri ana.
word.cebuano: Ang iyang mga kilat mingdan-ag sa kalibutan: Ang yuta nakakita, ug mikurog.
word.hebrew: ד  האירו ברקיו תבל    ראתה ותחל הארץ
word.hebrewmodern: האירו ברקיו תבל ראתה ותחל הארץ׃

word.spanish1909: Brame la mar y su plenitud; El mundo y los que en él habitan;

word.italian1927: Risuoni il mare e tutto ciò ch’è in esso; il mondo ed i suoi abitanti.
word.german1912: Das Meer brause und was darinnen ist, der Erdboden und die darauf wohnen.
word.french1910: Que la mer retentisse avec tout ce qu'elle contient, Que le monde et ceux qui l'habitent éclatent d'allégresse,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 願海和海中充滿的，都翻騰響鬧，願世界和住在世上的也都發聲；
word.korean: 바다와 거기 충만한 것과 그 중에 거하는 자는 다 외칠지어다
word.tagalog: Humugong ang dagat at ang buong naroon; ang sanglibutan at ang nagsisitahan doon;
word.maori: Kia haruru te moana me nga mea e hua ana i roto, te ao me ona tangata e noho ana i runga.
word.cebuano: Padaguoka ang dagat ug ang pagkapuno niana; Ang kalibutan, ug ang mga nanagpuyo niini;
word.hebrew: ז  ירעם הים ומלאו    תבל וישבי בה
word.hebrewmodern: ירעם הים ומלאו תבל וישבי בה׃

word.greekot: ἐν στύλῳ νεφέλης ἐλάλει πρὸς αὐτούς ἐφύλασσον τὰ μαρτύρια αὐτοῦ καὶ τὰ προστάγματα ἃ ἔδωκεν αὐτοῖς

word.kjv: Before the LORD; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
word.thailand: เฉพาะเบื้องพระพักตร์พระเยโฮวาห์ เพราะพระองค์เสด็จมาพิพากษาโลก พระองค์จะทรงพิพากษาโลกด้วยความชอบธรรม และชนชาติทั้งหลายด้วยความเที่ยงตรง
word.spanish1909: Delante de Jehová; porque vino á juzgar la tierra: Juzgará al mundo con justicia, Y á los pueblos con rectitud.
word.latinvulgate: Exaltate Dominum Deum nostrum, et adorate in monte sancto ejus, quoniam sanctus Dominus Deus noster.
word.italian1927: egli giudicherà il mondo con giustizia, e i popoli con rettitudine.
word.german1912: vor dem HERRN; denn er kommt das Erdreich zu richten. Er wird den Erdboden richten mit Gerechtigkeit und die Völker mit Recht.
word.french1910: Devant l'Eternel! Car il vient pour juger la terre; Il jugera le monde avec justice, Et les peuples avec équité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 它們都要在耶和華面前歡呼，因為他來是要審判全地，他要按著公義審判世界，憑著公正審判萬民。
word.korean: 저가 땅을 판단하려 임하실 것임이로다 저가 의로 세계를 판단하시며 공평으로 그 백성을 판단하시리로다
word.tagalog: Sa harap ng Panginoon, sapagka't siya'y dumarating upang hatulan ang lupa: kaniyang hahatulan ng katuwiran ang sanglibutan, at ng karapatan ang mga bayan.
word.maori: Ki te aroaro o Ihowa: e haere mai ana hoki ia ki te whakawa mo te whenua: ka whakawa ia mo te ao i runga i te tika, mo nga iwi hoki i runga i te pono.
word.cebuano: Sa atubangan ni Jehova; kay siya moanhi sa paghukom sa yuta: Sa pagkamatarung magahukom siya sa kalibutan, Ug sa mga katawohan uban ang katul-id.
word.hebrew: ט  לפני יהוה--    כי בא לשפט הארץ ישפט-תבל בצדק    ועמים במישרים
word.hebrewmodern: לפני יהוה כי בא לשפט הארץ ישפט תבל בצדק ועמים במישרים׃

word.greekot: ὑψοῦτε κύριον τὸν θεὸν ἡμῶν καὶ προσκυνεῖτε εἰς ὄρος ἅγιον αὐτοῦ ὅτι ἅγιος κύριος ὁ θεὸς ἡμῶν

word.kjv: While as yet he had not made the earth, nor the fields, nor the highest part of the dust of the world.
word.thailand: ก่อนที่พระองค์ทรงสร้างแผ่นดินโลก ทั้งไร่นา หรือก่อนผงคลีแรกของพิภพ
word.spanish1909: No había aún hecho la tierra, ni las campiñas, Ni el principio del polvo del mundo.
word.latinvulgate: Adhuc terram non fecerat, et flumina, et cardines orbis terræ.
word.italian1927: quand’egli ancora non avea fatto né la terra né i campi né le prime zolle della terra coltivabile.
word.german1912: da er die Erde noch nicht gemacht hatte und was darauf ist, noch die Berge des Erdbodens.
word.french1910: Il n'avait encore fait ni la terre, ni les campagnes, Ni le premier atome de la poussière du monde.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 那時，耶和華還沒有造大地和田野，也沒有造地上的泥土。
word.korean: 산이 세우심을 입기 전에 언덕이 생기기 전에 내가 이미 났으니
word.tagalog: Samantalang hindi pa niya nililikha ang lupa, ni ang mga parang man, ni ang pasimula man ng alabok ng sanglibutan.
word.maori: I te mea kahore ano i hanga noatia e ia te whenua, me nga parae, me te timatanga o te puehu o te ao.
word.cebuano: Samtang nga wala pa niya mabuhat ang yuta, ni ang kapatagan, Ni ang sinugdan sa abug sa kalibutan.
word.hebrew: כו  עד-לא עשה ארץ וחוצות    וראש עפרות תבל
word.hebrewmodern: עד לא עשה ארץ וחוצות וראש עפרות תבל׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: κύριος ἐποίησεν χώρας καὶ ἀοικήτους καὶ ἄκρα οἰκούμενα τῆς ὑπ' οὐρανόν

word.kjv: He hath made every thing beautiful in his time: also he hath set the world in their heart, so that no man can find out the work that God maketh from the beginning to the end.
word.thailand: พระองค์ทรงกระทำให้สรรพสิ่งงดงามตามฤดูกาลของมัน พระองค์ทรงบรรจุโลกไว้ในจิตใจของมนุษย์ เพื่อมนุษย์จะมองไม่เห็นว่าพระเจ้าทรงกระทำอะไรไว้ตั้งแต่เดิมจนกาลสุดปลาย
word.spanish1909: Todo lo hizo hermoso en su tiempo: y aun el mundo dió en su corazón, de tal manera que no alcance el hombre la obra de Dios desde el principio hasta el cabo.
word.latinvulgate: Cuncta fecit bona in tempore suo, et mundum tradidit disputationi eorum, ut non inveniat homo opus quod operatus est Deus ab initio usque ad finem.
word.italian1927: Dio ha fatto ogni cosa bella al suo tempo; egli ha perfino messo nei loro cuori il pensiero della eternità, quantunque l’uomo non possa comprendere dal principio alla fine l’opera che Dio ha fatta.
word.german1912: Er aber tut alles fein zu seiner Zeit und läßt ihr Herz sich ängsten, wie es gehen solle in der Welt; denn der Mensch kann doch nicht treffen das Werk, das Gott tut, weder Anfang noch Ende.
word.french1910: Il fait toute chose bonne en son temps; même il a mis dans leur coeur la pensée de l'éternité, bien que l'homme ne puisse pas saisir l'oeuvre que Dieu fait, du commencement jusqu'à la fin.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 他使萬事各按其時，成為美好；他又把永恆的意識放在人的心裡；雖然這樣，人還是不能察覺　神自始至終的作為。
word.korean: 하나님이 모든 것을 지으시되 때를 따라 아름답게 하셨고 또 사람에게 영원을 사모하는 마음을 주셨느니라 그러나 하나님의 하시는 일의 시종을 사람으로 측량할 수 없게 하셨도다
word.tagalog: Ginawa niya ang bawa't bagay na maganda sa kapanahunan niyaon: inilagay rin niya ang sanglibutan sa kanilang puso, na anopa't hindi matalos ng tao ang gawa na ginawa ng Dios mula sa pasimula hanggang sa wakas.
word.maori: ¶ I hanga e ia nga mea katoa kia ataahua i tona wa ano: a i whakanohoia e ia te ao ki o ratou ngakau, engari kia kaua te tangata e kite i ta te Atua mahi i mahi ai, mai i te timatanga a taea noatia te mutunga.
word.cebuano: Gihimo niya ang tanang butang nga matahum sa iyang panahon: gibutang usab niya ang pagka-walay katapusan sa sulod sa ilang kasingkasing, ngani aron ang tawo dili makatugkad sa buhat nga nahimo sa Dios gikan sa sinugdan bisan hangtud sa katapusan.
word.hebrew: יא את הכל עשה יפה בעתו גם את העלם נתן בלבם--מבלי אשר לא ימצא האדם את המעשה אשר עשה האלהים מראש ועד סוף
word.hebrewmodern: את הכל עשה יפה בעתו גם את העלם נתן בלבם מבלי אשר לא ימצא האדם את המעשה אשר עשה האלהים מראש ועד סוף׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: σὺν τὰ πάντα ἐποίησεν καλὰ ἐν καιρῷ αὐτοῦ καί γε σὺν τὸν αἰῶνα ἔδωκεν ἐν καρδίᾳ αὐτῶν ὅπως μὴ εὕρῃ ὁ ἄνθρωπος τὸ ποίημα ὃ ἐποίησεν ὁ θεός ἀπ' ἀρχῆς καὶ μέχρι τέλους

word.kjv: And I will punish the world for their evil, and the wicked for their iniquity; and I will cause the arrogancy of the proud to cease, and will lay low the haughtiness of the terrible.
word.thailand: เราจะลงโทษโลกเพราะความชั่วร้าย และคนชั่วเพราะความชั่วช้าของเขา เราจะกระทำให้ความเย่อหยิ่งของคนจองหองสิ้นสุด และปราบความยโสของคนโหดร้าย
word.spanish1909: Y visitaré la maldad sobre el mundo, y sobre los impíos su iniquidad; y haré que cese la arrogancia de los soberbios, y abatiré la altivez de los fuertes.
word.latinvulgate: Et visitabo super orbis mala, et contra impios iniquitatem eorum ; et quiscere faciam superbiam infidelium, et arrogantiam fortium humiliabo.
word.italian1927: Io punirò il mondo per la sua malvagità, e gli empi per la loro iniquità; farò cessare l’alterigia de’ superbi e abbatterò l’arroganza de’ tiranni.
word.german1912: Ich will den Erdboden heimsuchen um seiner Bosheit willen und will dem Hochmut der Stolzen ein Ende machen und die Hoffart der Gewaltigen demütigen, {~} {~}
word.french1910: Je punirai le monde pour sa malice, Et les méchants pour leurs iniquités; Je ferai cesser l'orgueil des hautains, Et j'abattrai l'arrogance des tyrans.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我必因世界的邪惡施行刑罰，也必因惡人的罪孽懲罰他們；我要使狂妄人的驕傲止息，使強暴人的狂傲降卑。
word.korean: 내가 세상의 악과 악인의 죄를 벌하며 교만한 자의 오만을 끊으며 강포한 자의 거만을 낮출 것이며
word.tagalog: At aking parurusahan ang sanglibutan dahil sa kanilang kasamaan, at ang mga masama dahil sa kanilang kabalakyutan; at aking patitigilin ang kahambugan ng palalo, at aking ibababa ang kapalaluan ng kakilakilabot.
word.maori: Ka whiua ano e ahau te ao mo to ratou kino, te hunga kino hoki, mo to ratou he; ka whakamutua hoki e ahau te whakapehapeha o te hunga whakakake, ka whakahokia iho ano ki raro te whakapehapeha o te hunga kino.
word.cebuano: Ug pagasilotan ko ang kalibutan tungod sa ilang pagkadautan, ug ang mga tawong dautan tungod sa ilang kasal-anan: ug pahunongon ko ang pagkamapahitas-on sa mga palabilabihon, ug pagapaubson ko ang pagkamapahitas-on sa mga tawong makalilisang.
word.hebrew: יא ופקדתי על תבל רעה ועל רשעים עונם והשבתי גאון זדים וגאות עריצים אשפיל
word.hebrewmodern: ופקדתי על תבל רעה ועל רשעים עונם והשבתי גאון זדים וגאות עריצים אשפיל׃

word.greekot: καὶ ἐντελοῦμαι τῇ οἰκουμένῃ ὅλῃ κακὰ καὶ τοῖς ἀσεβέσιν τὰς ἁμαρτίας αὐτῶν καὶ ἀπολῶ ὕβριν ἀνόμων καὶ ὕβριν ὑπερηφάνων ταπεινώσω

word.kjv: That made the world as a wilderness, and destroyed the cities thereof; that opened not the house of his prisoners?
word.thailand: ผู้ที่ได้กระทำให้โลกเป็นเหมือนถิ่นทุรกันดาร และคว่ำหัวเมืองของโลกเสีย ผู้ไม่ยอมให้เชลยกลับไปบ้านของเขา'
word.spanish1909: Que puso el mundo como un desierto, que asoló sus ciudades; que á sus presos nunca abrió la cárcel?
word.latinvulgate: qui posuit orbem desertum, et urbes ejus destruxit, vinctis ejus non aperuit carcerem ?
word.italian1927: che riduceva il mondo in un deserto, ne distruggeva le città, e non rimandava mai liberi a casa i suoi prigionieri?"
word.german1912: der den Erdboden zur Wüste machte und die Städte darin zerbrach und gab seine Gefangenen nicht los?"
word.french1910: Qui réduisait le monde en désert, Qui ravageait les villes, Et ne relâchait point ses prisonniers?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使世界如同荒野，傾覆城鎮，又不釋放囚犯的，就是這人嗎？’
word.korean: 세계를 황무케 하며 성읍을 파괴하며 사로잡힌 자를 그 집으로 놓아 보내지 않던 자가 아니뇨 하리로다
word.tagalog: Na ginawang gaya ng ilang ang sanglibutan, at gumiba ng mga bayan nito; na hindi nagpakawala ng kaniyang mga bilanggo upang magsiuwi?
word.maori: I mea nei i te ao hei koraha, wahia ana e ia ona pa: kihai i tuku i ana herehere ki to ratou wahi?
word.cebuano: Nga maoy naghimo sa kalibutan nga ingon sa usa ka kamingawan, ug nakalaglag sa mga ciudad niini; nga wala magpapauli sa iyang mga binilanggo sa ilang pinuy-anan?
word.hebrew: יז שם תבל כמדבר ועריו הרס אסיריו לא פתח ביתה
word.hebrewmodern: שם תבל כמדבר ועריו הרס אסיריו לא פתח ביתה׃
word.textusreceptus: no translation for this version
word.greekot: ὁ θεὶς τὴν οἰκουμένην ὅλην ἔρημον καὶ τὰς πόλεις καθεῖλεν τοὺς ἐν ἐπαγωγῇ οὐκ ἔλυσεν

word.kjv: Prepare slaughter for his children for the iniquity of their fathers; that they do not rise, nor possess the land, nor fill the face of the world with cities.
word.thailand: จงเตรียมสังหารลูกๆของเขาเถิด เพราะความชั่วช้าแห่งบิดาของเขา เกรงว่าเขาทั้งหลายจะลุกขึ้นเป็นเจ้าของแผ่นดิน และกระทำให้พื้นโลกเต็มไปด้วยหัวเมือง'"
word.spanish1909: Aparejad sus hijos para el matadero por la maldad de sus padres: no se levanten, ni posean la tierra, é hinchan la haz del mundo de ciudades.
word.latinvulgate: Præparate filios ejus occisioni, in iniquitate patrum suorum : non consurgent, nec hæreditabunt terram, neque implebunt faciem orbis civitatum.
word.italian1927: Preparate il massacro dei suoi figli, a motivo della iniquità dei loro padri! Che non si rialzino più a conquistare la terra, a riempire il mondo di città!
word.german1912: Richtet zu, daß man seine Kinder schlachte um ihrer Väter Missetat willen, daß sie nicht aufkommen noch das Land erben noch den Erdboden voll Städte machen.
word.french1910: Préparez le massacre des fils, A cause de l'iniquité de leurs pères! Qu'ils ne se relèvent pas pour conquérir la terre, Et remplir le monde d'ennemis! -
word.chinesencvtraditional: 因為他們的祖宗犯了罪孽，你們要為他的子孫預備屠殺之處；不要讓他們興起來，佔有地土，在世上布滿城鎮。”
word.korean: 너희는 그들의 열조의 죄악을 인하여 그 자손 도륙하기를 예비하여 그들로 일어나 땅을 취하여 세상에 성읍을 충만케 하지 못하게 하라
word.tagalog: Mangaghanda kayo na pumatay sa kanilang mga anak dahil sa kasamaan ng kanilang mga magulang; upang sila'y huwag magsibangon, at ariin ang lupain, at punuin ang ibabaw ng lupa ng mga bayan.
word.maori: Kia tere te patu mo ana tamariki, mo te he o o ratou matua; kei kake, kei riro ano i a ratou te whenua, kei kapi te mata o te ao i o ratou pa.
word.cebuano: Hikayon ninyo ang pagpatay sa iyang mga anak tungod sa kasal-anan sa ilang mga amahan, aron sila dili manindog ug makaangkon sa yuta, ug pun-on ang nawong sa kalibutan sa mga ciudad.
word.hebrew: כא הכינו לבניו מטבח בעון אבותם בל יקמו וירשו ארץ ומלאו פני תבל ערים
word.hebrewmodern: הכינו לבניו מטבח בעון אבותם בל יקמו וירשו ארץ ומלאו פני תבל ערים׃

word.kjv: All ye inhabitants of the world, and dwellers on the earth, see ye, when he lifteth up an ensign on the mountains; and when he bloweth a trumpet, hear ye.
word.thailand: ท่านทั้งปวงผู้เป็นชาวพิภพ ท่านอาศัยอยู่บนแผ่นดินโลก เมื่อเขายกอาณัติสัญญาณขึ้นบนภูเขา จงมองดู เมื่อเขาเป่าแตร จงฟัง
word.spanish1909: Vosotros, todos los moradores del mundo y habitantes de la tierra, cuando levantará bandera en los montes, la veréis; y oiréis cuando tocará trompeta.
word.latinvulgate: Omnes habitatores orbis, qui moramini in terra, cum elevatum fuerit signum in montibus, videbitis, et clangorem tubæ audietis.
word.italian1927: Voi tutti, abitanti del mondo, voi tutti che abitate sulla terra, quando il vessillo sarà issato sui monti, guardate! quando la tromba sonerà, ascoltate!
word.german1912: Alle, die ihr auf Erden wohnet und im Lande sitzet, werden sehen, wie man das Panier auf den Bergen aufwerfen wird, und hören, wie man die Drommeten blasen wird.
word.french1910: Vous tous, habitants du monde, habitants de la terre, Voyez la bannière qui se dresse sur les montagnes, Ecoutez la trompette qui sonne!
word.chinesencvtraditional: 世上所有的居民，住在全地上的人哪！山上豎起旗幟的時候，你們要注意；號角吹響的時候，你們要聆聽。
word.korean: 세상의 모든 거민, 지상에 거하는 너희여 산들 위에 기호를 세우거든 너희는 보고 나팔을 불거든 너희는 들을지니라
word.tagalog: Kayong lahat na nananahan sa sanglibutan, at kayong mga naninirahan sa lupa, pagka ang isang watawat ay nataas sa mga bundok, inyong tingnan; at pagka ang pakakak ay hinipan, makinig kayo.
word.maori: E nga tangata katoa o te ao, e te hunga e noho ana i te whenua, titiro mai, ina whakaarahia te kara ki runga i nga maunga; whakarongo mai, ina whakatangihia te tetere.
word.cebuano: Kamong tanan nga mga pumoluyo sa kalibutan, ug kamong mga pumoluyo sa yuta, sa diha nga ang usa ka bandila patindugon na sa kabukiran, tan-awa ninyo; ug sa diha nga huypon na ang trompeta, pamatia ninyo.
word.hebrew: ג כל ישבי תבל ושכני ארץ כנשא נס הרים תראו וכתקע שופר תשמעו  {ס}

word.kjv: And it shall come to pass after the end of seventy years, that the LORD will visit Tyre, and she shall turn to her hire, and shall commit fornication with all the kingdoms of the world upon the face of the earth.
word.thailand: ต่อมาเมื่อสิ้นเจ็ดสิบปี พระเยโฮวาห์จะทรงเยี่ยมเยียนเมืองไทระ และเมืองนั้นจะกลับไปรับจ้างใหม่ และจะเล่นชู้กับบรรดาราชอาณาจักรทั้งสิ้นบนพื้นโลก
word.spanish1909: Y acontecerá, que al fin de los setenta años visitará Jehová á Tiro: y tornaráse á su ganancia, y otra vez fornicará con todos los reinos de la tierra sobre la haz de la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Et erit post septuaginta annos : visitabit Dominus Tyrum, et reducet eam ad mercedes suas, et rursum fornicabitur cum universis regnis terræ super faciem terræ ;
word.italian1927: E in capo a settant’anni, l’Eterno visiterà Tiro, ed essa tornerà ai suoi guadagni, e si prostituirà con tutti i regni del mondo sulla faccia della terra.
word.german1912: Denn nach siebzig Jahren wird der HERR Tyrus heimsuchen, daß sie wiederkomme zu ihrem Hurenlohn und Hurerei treibe mit allen Königreichen auf Erden.
word.french1910: Au bout de soixante-dix ans, l'Eternel visitera Tyr, Et elle retournera à son salaire impur; Elle se prostituera à tous les royaumes de la terre, Sur la face du monde.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 七十年後，耶和華必眷顧推羅，推羅就恢復繁榮，可以與地上的萬國交易。
word.korean: 칠십년이 필한 후에 여호와께서 두로를 권고하시리니 그가 다시 취리하여 지면에 있는 열방과 음란을 행할 것이며
word.tagalog: At mangyayari, sa katapusan ng pitong pung taon, na dadalawin ng Panginoon ang Tiro, at pagbabalikan niya ang kaniyang upa, at magiging patutot sa lahat ng kaharian ng sanglibutan sa ibabaw ng lupa.
word.maori: Na i te mutunga o nga tau e whitu tekau ka tirohia a Taira e Ihowa, a ka hoki ia ki tana utu, ka kairau ano ki nga kingitanga katoa o te whenua i runga i te mata o te oneone.
word.cebuano: Ug mahitabo sa tapus ang kapitoan ka tuig, nga si Jehova moduaw sa Tiro, ug kini mobalik sa iyang suhol ug magapakighilawas uban sa tanang mga gingharian sa kalibutan ibabaw sa nawong sa yuta.
word.hebrew: יז והיה מקץ שבעים שנה יפקד יהוה את צר ושבה לאתננה וזנתה את כל ממלכות הארץ על פני האדמה
word.hebrewmodern: והיה מקץ שבעים שנה יפקד יהוה את צר ושבה לאתננה וזנתה את כל ממלכות הארץ על פני האדמה׃

word.kjv: The earth mourneth and fadeth away, the world languisheth and fadeth away, the haughty people of the earth do languish.
word.thailand: โลกก็ไว้ทุกข์และเหี่ยวแห้งไป พิภพก็อ่อนระทวยและเหี่ยวแห้ง คนสูงศักดิ์ของโลกก็อ่อนระทวยไป
word.spanish1909: Destruyóse, cayó la tierra; enfermó, cayó el mundo; enfermaron los altos pueblos de la tierra.
word.latinvulgate: Luxit, et defluxit terra, et infirmata est ; defluxit orbis, infirmata est altitudo populi terræ.
word.italian1927: La terra è in lutto, è spossata, il mondo langue, è spossato, gli altolocati fra il popolo della terra languono.
word.german1912: Das Land steht jämmerlich und verderbt; der Erdboden nimmt ab und verdirbt; die Höchsten des Volks im Lande nehmen ab.
word.french1910: Le pays est triste, épuisé; Les habitants sont abattus, languissants; Les chefs du peuple sont sans force.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 大地悲哀衰殘，世界零落衰殘，地上居高位的人也衰敗了。
word.korean: 땅이 슬퍼하고 쇠잔하며 세계가 쇠약하고 쇠잔하며 세상 백성중에 높은 자가 쇠약하며
word.tagalog: Ang lupa ay tumatangis at nasisira, ang sanglibutan ay nanghihina at nanglalata, ang mapagmataas na bayan sa lupa ay nanghihina.
word.maori: E tangi ana te whenua, ngohe noa iho; kahakore kau te ao, ngohe noa iho; harotu kau te hunga rarahi o te whenua.
word.cebuano: Ang yuta nagabangutan ug nagakawagtang, ang kalibutan nagakaniwang ug nagakawagtang, ang mapahitas-on nga katawohan sa yuta nagakaniwang gayud.
word.hebrew: ד אבלה נבלה הארץ אמללה נבלה תבל אמללו מרום עם הארץ
